title: Friday's Gazette: The Rat Market opens its doors!
generic intro: (Hi! I'm a work-in-progress tumblr bot for Fallen London world qualities updates! I'm still very early in development so I may not post every WQ update yet.
The Rat Market opens for the weekend! Take a look at the ratty bargains within!

rat_season.text: We are in the Rat Season of {value}, meaning the following items are available for sale:

rat_moon.text: The Rat-Moon is {value}: [[{item}]] can be bought for {ratprice} Rat Shillings.

rat_wind.text: The Rat-Wind blows {value}: [[{item}]] can be bought for {ratprice} Rat Shillings.

rat_rlseason.text: The False Season is {value}: [[{item}]] can be bought for 10,000 Rat Shillings.

demand_tempestuous.1: Additionally, the Shrivelled Celebrant is selling [[Gant-filled Mirrorcatch Boxes|Gant-filled Mirrorcatch Box]] for 3,750 Rat Shillings.
